description.zh-cn: 中国焊接专家，曾任中国科学院金属研究所副所长、研究员、博士生导师。
description.en: Chinese welding expert, former deputy director, researcher, and doctoral supervisor of the Institute of Metal Research, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

nodes.id: 中国科学院金属研究所

zh-cn: 中国科学院金属研究所

nodes.id: 国务院政府特殊津贴专家

zh-cn: 国务院政府特殊津贴专家

description.zh-cn: 享受中华人民共和国国务院颁发的政府特殊津贴的专家、学者、技术人员。
description.en: Experts, scholars, and technicians who enjoy the special government allowance issued by the State Council of the People's Republic of China.
Si Chongyao was a native of Zhuji, Zhejiang.

relationships.target: 中国科学院金属研究所

position.zh-cn: 副所长、研究员、博士生导师

description.zh-cn: 斯重遥曾任中国科学院金属研究所副所长、研究员、博士生导师。
description.en: Si Chongyao served as the deputy director, researcher, and doctoral supervisor of the Institute of Metal Research, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 根据“中国共产党党员”分类，斯重遥是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the category 'Chinese Communist Party members', Si Chongyao was a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 根据“国立交通大学校友 (唐山)”分类，斯重遥是国立交通大学 (唐山)的校友。
description.en: According to the category 'National Chiao Tung University alumni (Tangshan)', Si Chongyao was an alumnus of National Chiao Tung University (Tangshan).

description.zh-cn: 根据“中国科学院研究员”分类，斯重遥是中国科学院研究员。
description.en: According to the category 'Researchers of the Chinese Academy of Sciences', Si Chongyao was a researcher at the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

relationships.target: 国务院政府特殊津贴专家

description.zh-cn: 根据“享受国务院政府特殊津贴专家”分类，斯重遥是享受国务院政府特殊津贴专家。
description.en: According to the category 'Experts enjoying special government allowances from the State Council', Si Chongyao was an expert who received this allowance.
